metadata.title: CVE-2022-2164 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Extensions API in Google Chrome prior to103.0.5060.53 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to bypass discretionary access control via a craftedHTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
